nl.tudelft.simulation.jstats.streams

Class Java2Random

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Random
      • nl.tudelft.simulation.jstats.streams.Java2Random
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, StreamInterface

    public class Java2Random
extends java.util.Random
implements StreamInterface
    The Java2Random is an extention of the java.util.Random class which implements the StreamInterface.

    copyright (c) 2004-2018 Delft University of Technology , the Netherlands.
    See for project information www.simulation.tudelft.nl
    License of use: Lesser General Public License (LGPL) , no warranty.

    Since:
    1.5
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.2 $ $Date: 2010/08/10 11:38:40 $
    Author:
    Peter Jacobs

    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Java2Random()
      creates a new Java2Random and in initializes with System.currentTimeMillis constructs a new Java2Random.
      Java2Random(long seed)
      reates a new Java2Random and in initializes with a given seed.
